amendment.description: To require quarterly reports on the war strategy in Iraq.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2579 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2579 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Bayh. (consideration: CR S12778-12791; text: CR S12791) To require quarterly reports on the war strategy in Iraq.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2579 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Bayh.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2579 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
